relation: The reason I chose NSC was because it is cheaper than UNLV p/credits.
Not too much in the form of food.
There is no dorm living that I am aware of.
Since this is the school that I have had to take my tough classes (anatomy/physiology) at I give it 4 stars.

Always have all information you think you need to help you when asking questions. Especially for the admissions department. They have young students who assist and often times I found myself figuring out what needed to be done on my own.
It is an okay college for me to get done what I need to do. I am not planning on graduating from NSC. I am taking upper division credits in order to apply for another college to get my masters.
pageTitle: Nevada State College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {81481=Nevada State College offers many activities for their students. In the Spring semester of 2013 they had a Hula themed carnival which was a great way to meet new people that you go to school with., 77541=The school has plans to add buildings to make the school more fun in the next couple years. The school recently received the approvals to start building by the authorities, so by 2015 the school should have bigger and better buildings. But at the moment, activities and fun for students are sub-par., 117298=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: In three sentences Nevada State College is very personal and comfortable campus. The community seems to be peaceful. The student to teacher ratio is better than a larger university. Login to rate or flag the reviews Martha from Las Vegas, NV 03/24/2012 Reviewer is A current student here. 1 out of 1 people found this review useful. 3 of 29 Categories Comments Campus Safety The school, although on three different campuses, is extremely close-knit and safe. We have round-the-clock security guards who keep our grounds safe. Bang for the buck Nevada State is extremely affordable, especially compared to the other colleges and universities available in Nevada. What to do for fun Nevada State College has a wide selection of student groups and social gatherings available. Food and Dining There could be a bigger selection of food on
